title: AlarmStorageGetTextListName (Function)
text:
FUNCTION AlarmStorageGetTextListName : POINTER TO STRING
This function can be used to determine the name of the textlist of an alarm group,
that was read from the alarm storage.

rows.Name: AlarmStorageGetTextListName
rows.Comment:
A pointer to a STRING containing the name of the textlist. A
NULL pointer if the corresponding information cannot be
retrieved

rows.Name: udiAlarmGroupId
rows.Comment:
The internal id of the alarm group, that was read from the
alarm storage

rows:
The internal id of the alarm, that was read from the alarm
storage
